{{Disambiguation}}
A '''JAR''' file contains Java classes and associated metadata and resources; it is often executed as a program by the [[Tutorial:Update Java#What is Java?|Java Virtual Machine]] (JVM).

In {{MC}}, it may refer to:

* {{File|file|[[client.jar]]|inline=1}} &ndash; a JAR file that contains the game program and assets of ''[[Minecraft: Java Edition]]''.
* {{File|file|[[server.jar]]|inline=1}} &ndash; a JAR file that only contains the resources necessary to run a ''Java Edition'' [[server]].
